task_summary: Robot must navigate the tabletop while avoiding a visible obstacle (books) to reach the blue pen using visual detection and sequential waypoints.

task_long_description.overview: In this episode, a robot arm is tasked to reach a blue pen located across a tabletop while avoiding a stack of books acting as an obstacle. The robot must perceive the pen, plan a route around the obstacle, and incrementally move past the books before approaching the pen. Visual feedback and waypointing are used to ensure successful navigation, overcoming occlusions and restricted paths.
preconditions: Workspace clear except for obstacle and goal pen
stepwise_plan: Scan to confirm visibility of the blue pen
Detect position of the blue pen
Move to a waypoint close to the obstacle
Navigate around the obstacle to the next waypoint
success_criteria: Robot arrives at the blue pen, avoiding the obstacle
Pen is within reachable, unobstructed area
failure_and_recovery: Failure to perceive pen: rescan up to 3x
Blocked path: reroute via alternate waypoints
task_long_description.termination: Task ends when robot is confirmed at the blue pen location or after recovery attempts are exhausted

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

task_instruction: avoid obstacle and reach the blue pen

node_specs.description: Checks if blue pen is visible; triggers scan if not.
Performs patterned scan for the blue pen if not immediately visible.
Detects precise pen location for navigation.
Moves toward first waypoint, near obstacle.
Moves beyond obstacle to second waypoint.

recovery_strategy: Abort and retreat if collision risk detected
assumptions: Frames show the robot moving around books to reach the blue pen; no physical grasp, only approach and arrival.
Instruction does not mention grasp, frames show navigation.
Obstacle avoidance inferred from robot's change in position and visible books between robot and pen.

expected_success_criteria: Robot arrives at the blue pen without contacting obstacle.
